column4: I do not understand his flash issue. I cannot reproduce it. He does not error on it. nvidia-173 is broken in precise, but through downgrading xorg, we got it running... still no flash.  I do not have an explaination or understanding of the root problem. Either the 2 day old flash player has broken nouvau AND all legacy nvidia drivers... or... something is brokedybroke that I cannot find on their machine. I am spent.
well flash is 99% perfect here on pangolin.. I get a "blue" skin tone on *certain (not all) youtube videos.. (somebody else mentioned it too here last week)
with the 'color' hint issue? because that's the error i get
i think you mean the other one
I do not understand
says who?
then why did they partner to store flash on canonical's third party repository?
you've got a link?
in a way it's wrong because flash comes with chrome, so i'll just switch to using chrome if i cant get the latest flash plugin for firefox
I am in #ubuntu-offtopic if you want to continue
he's trying to get hdmi to work
ouch another module can load that ati hdmi..
It appears as though he originally installed ubuntu on an ntfs partition, he then ran fixmbr or something crushing grub... we are just trying to find his install so as to reinstall/update grub2
there's no linux partitions listed of type 83.. only a swap, and the rest ntfs
It appears as though he originally installed ubuntu on an ntfs partition
you mean he's using wubi?
if what's the case?
no.. i'm asking if he used wubi.. that would be a loopback file on ntfs
and by default it's ext3 within the loopback..
you sure he's not using wubi?
it's a usb drive
